title: Wow I love getting out an 18/18 Edwin VanCleef on turn 5
body:
With wisp/wisp/charge pirate/shadowstep/charge pirate/shadowstep/charge pirate/deadly poison/sinister strike

And then the fucking cancer **mage** I'm up against freezes him for SIX TURNS through TWO CONCEALS

And the only reason she didn't freeze him for 7 was because she used her last frostbolt to alex/fireball/fireball/frostbolt my face.

Gut this fucking goddamn garbage cancer class
